name: Fran and the Demon Hunter.
description:
Francoise, or just Fran for short, lost her job... But she got a nice house watching gig! And on her fist day she sees a half demon, half human being that hunts demons, it also happens that this creature is her best friend Nomade!

Things will get interesting. Emotional even!

Part 1 of a small series about two girls that like and love each other.
